title: LETS MAKE IT LIKE CS GO ! < 3
body: lmfao i think it would be so awesome to have a trading system in LOL for skins and what ever just like CS GO selling / trading them is always fun might make more poeple excited for league and what it offers           lets make this to the top quick               {{item:3006}}

replies.body:
I really enjoy CS:GO's trading system, so I definitely see what you mean. Unfortunately, Help & Support is more for players looking for help with technical issues. [Miscellaneous](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) is the best sub-board for suggestions and feature ideas. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
